member.name: T:eHISDateFormat.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:eHISDateFormat.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:eHISDateFormat.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:eHISDateFormat.eHISDateFormat.eHISDate.FormatDate(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the date in "dd/MM/yyyy" format and returns date object

member.name: M:eHISDateFormat.eHISDateFormat.eHISDate.MONFormatDate(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the date in "dd/MM/yyyy" format and returns date in string format "dd-MON-yyyy"

member.name: M:eHISDateFormat.eHISDateFormat.eHISDate.DOBDATE(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the date in "dd/MM/yyyy" format and returns date in string format "dd-MON-yyyy HH:mm:ss tt"

member.name: M:eHISDateFormat.eHISDateFormat.eHISDate.MONReverseDateFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the date in "dd-MON-yyyy" format and returns date in string format "dd/MM/yyyy". Truncates the time part if given.

member.name: M:eHISDateFormat.eHISDateFormat.eHISDate.MONReverseDateFormatWITHTIME(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the date in "dd-MON-yyyy" format and returns date in string format "dd/MM/yyyy". Appends the time part if not given.

member.name: M:eHISDateFormat.eHISDateFormat.eHISDate.ReverseDateFormat(System.String)
member.summary: Takes the date in "dd/MM/yyyy" format and returns date in string format "MM/dd/yyyy", and vice versa
